dt: {bc}any of various usually cold dishes: such as
{bc}raw greens (such as lettuce) often combined with other vegetables and toppings and served especially with dressing
{bc}small pieces of food (such as pasta, meat, fruit, or vegetables) usually mixed with a dressing (such as mayonnaise) or set in gelatin
{bc}a green vegetable or herb grown for salad

et: Middle English {it}salade{/it}, from Middle French, from Old Italian (northern dialects) {it}salata, salada{/it}, from {it}salar{/it} to salt, from {it}sal{/it} salt, from Latin
shortdef: any of various usually cold dishes: such as
raw greens (such as lettuce) often combined with other vegetables and toppings and served especially with dressing
small pieces of food (such as pasta, meat, fruit, or vegetables) usually mixed with a dressing (such as mayonnaise) or set in gelatin

dt: {bc}a self-service counter (as in a restaurant) featuring an array of salad makings and dressings

shortdef: a self-service counter (as in a restaurant) featuring an array of salad makings and dressings

dt.t: my {it}salad days{/it} when I was green in judgment

shortdef: time of youthful inexperience or indiscretion; also : an early flourishing period : heyday

dt: {bc}an edible vegetable oil suitable for use in salad dressings

shortdef: an edible vegetable oil suitable for use in salad dressings

dt: {bc}a thick liquid that is eaten on salads, sandwiches, etc.

shortdef: a thick liquid that is eaten on salads, sandwiches, etc.

dt: {bc}a usually seasoned mixture of liquids that is added to a salad

shortdef: a usually seasoned mixture of liquids that is added to a salad

dt: {bc}vegetables that are grown for their leaves and commonly used in salads

shortdef: vegetables that are grown for their leaves and commonly used in salads

dt: {bc}a tossed salad usually made of romaine, garlic, anchovies, and croutons and dressed with olive oil, coddled egg, lemon juice, and grated cheese

shortdef: a tossed salad usually made of romaine, garlic, anchovies, and croutons and dressed with olive oil, coddled egg, lemon juice, and grated cheese

dt: {bc}a meal-size salad that includes lettuce, tomatoes, hard-boiled eggs, and julienne strips of meat and cheese

shortdef: a meal-size salad that includes lettuce, tomatoes, hard-boiled eggs, and julienne strips of meat and cheese

dt: {bc}a tossed salad made typically with chopped chicken or turkey, tomatoes, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, blue cheese, and lettuce and dressed with a vinaigrette

et: probably from Robert H. {it}Cobb{/it} †1970 American restaurateur
shortdef: a tossed salad made typically with chopped chicken or turkey, tomatoes, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, blue cheese, and lettuce and dressed with a vinaigrette
